cancellationPolicies.label: Deposit Only rates
cancellationPolicies.description: This property has a 2 day cancellation policy. Failure to cancel within this time will result in a cancellation charge equal to the first night of your stay, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information).

privates.name: Deluxe 3 Bed Private Ensuite
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: Views to Mt Ngauruhoe. Featuring Queen bed. Extra single bed available for small children. Ensuite bathroom, Outdoor deck, Free Wi-Fi, Heating, Wardrobe, Desk, Digital TV, Mini fridge, Kettle-tea & coffee making facilities, bathroom amenities + hairdryer

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

privates.name: Deluxe 3 Bed Private Ensuite
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: Spectacular views over Tongariro National Park. Queen bed, Ensuite bathroom with shower, Outdoor furnished deck, Free Wi-Fi, Heating, Wardrobe, Desk, Digital TV, Mini fridge, kettle, tea & coffee making facilities, bathroom amenities including a hairdryer

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

privates.name: Deluxe 4 Bed Private Ensuite
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: Ideal for 2 adults & 2 children. Located on lower ground floor. Queen bed + single bunk.  Bathroom with shower over the bath.  Furnished balcony leads to communal outdoor deck.  Free Wi-Fi, Wardrobe, Desk, Digital TV, Heating, mini fridge, Kettle.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

freeCancellation.label: Free Cancellation rates
freeCancellation.description: If you cancel your booking before 23:59 14th Oct 2025 (NZDT) your deposit will be refunded to your payment card. If you cancel after 23:59 14th Oct 2025 (NZDT) or in the event of a no-show, your deposit will not be refunded and the total of the first night's accommodation will be charged to your payment card, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information). Please note that cancellations must be made directly within your booking in My Account.
